title: 求助,1.14nbt标签
author: sycgogo
txt_content:
求助大佬们,1.14的多个nbt标签之间怎么过渡
1.12是逗号隔开,1.14就不行了,有人知道怎么搞吗

replies.author: Chelover_C60
replies.txt_content:
sycgogo 发表于 2019-8-23 12:49
give @p minecraft:diamond{display:{Name:'{"text":"亮晶晶的可耐钻石"}',Lore:['{"text":"MC_MoCha专属 ...
格式错误，display和Enchantments应该在同一个根目录下
give @p minecraft:diamond{display:{Name:'{"text":"亮晶晶的可耐钻石"}',Lore:['{"text":"MC_MoCha专属"},{"text":"南非迈克尔钻石"}']},Enchantments:[{id:"protection",lvl:10}]}复制代码

replies.author: sycgogo
replies.txt_content:
xmdhs 发表于 2019-8-23 12:46
能看看你写的吗
可以可以

replies.author: sycgogo
xmdhs
replies.txt_content:
sycgogo 发表于 2019-8-23 12:49
give @p minecraft:diamond{display:{Name:'{"text":"亮晶晶的可耐钻石"}',Lore:['{"text":"MC_MoCha专属 ...
give @p minecraft:diamond{display:{Name:'{"text":"亮晶晶的可耐钻石"}',Lore:['{"text":"MC_MoCha专属"},{"text":"南非迈克尔钻石"}']},Enchantments:[{id:"protection",lvl:10}]}


你也要加到 {} 里面才行啊。。

replies.txt_content:
